name: Dinosaur Train & Sounds Fun Dino JigSaw Puzzle Game for Toddler & Preschool Kids | Educational Games for Children 3 4 5 6 Years Free !!!
name_original: Dinosaur Train & Sounds Fun Dino JigSaw Puzzle Game for Toddler & Preschool Kids | Educational Games for Children 3 4 5 6 Years Free !!!
description: This is a game for studying English about dinosaur names by learning through simple puzzle game which kids ,toddlers and preschoolers can play . It is played by dragging words , or pictures of dinosaurs to match . This free application is intended to support children learning by using the game as a media to have fun of learning, through tablets and smartphones.
